meanings.definition: The style of decoration of a room or building.
meanings.sent1: The decors in the living room are elegant and modern.
meanings.sent2: She carefully chose the decors for her new apartment.
meanings.sent3: The decors at the party were so colorful and festive.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic touch transformed the decors into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The decors created a warm and inviting atmosphere in the restaurant.

meanings.definition: The furnishings and decorations of a room or building.
meanings.sent1: The decors in the hotel lobby were luxurious and opulent.
meanings.sent2: They rearranged the decors in the office to create a more productive environment.
meanings.sent3: The decors in the old mansion seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent4: The decors in the store window beckoned customers inside.
meanings.sent5: The decors in the garden added a touch of whimsy to the space.
